name: Lucinda
description:
Lucinda is a light, short, horror game were you play as Lucinda, a young woman dreaming and trying to wake up from a deep dream.

Controls
  • Move with the arrow keys.
  • Interact with your surroundings and NPCs by contact.
  • You can interact with some objects in your surroundings with Enter key.
  • F4 for Full screen.
  • 10 - 30 min gameplay.
  • Lucinda is a short game so there is no saving nor in game menu.
Install instructions
  1. Download the game file to your preferred location in your computer.
  2. Extract the files from the .zip with your preferred program (7zip, winrar, etc).
  3. Click "Lucinda.exe"  to play.

FAQ

Does the game has jump scares?

No, Lucinda has no jump scares.

Can I get a free copy of the game? I'm a youtuber / do gameplay videos!

This game is part of itch.io Press system, so if you have a Press account you can download this game for free! Check itch.io account settings for more info.
